# Textarea

## Props
| Name                   | Type   | Default  | Required | Description |
| ---------------------- | ------ | -------- | -------- | ----------- |
| blurDebounceInterval   | Number | 0        | false    |             |
| changeDebounceInterval | Number | 500      | false    |             |
| updateOnBlur           | Bool   | true     | false    |             |
| updateOnChange         | Bool   | true     | false    |             |
| value                  | String |          | false    |             |
| onBlur                 | Func   | () => {} | false    |             |
